text:
When teams are clear about their purpose, dynamics improve.  

Formal momentum accelerates in these teams.  

This leads to a higher cumulative contribution from the team.  

How do we achieve clarity of purpose in our teams?  

We can also seek clarity in our personal endeavors.  

One way is to decide on an essential intent.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Clarity of purpose in teams and personal endeavors can be achieved by deciding on an essential intent.
